statements: SELECT * FROM plant_watering_schedule;
SELECT schedule_id, plant_id, schedule_time FROM plant_watering_schedule ORDER BY schedule_time DESC;
SELECT plant_id, water_duration FROM plant_watering_schedule WHERE moisture_threshold >= 0.5;
SELECT * FROM plant_watering_schedule WHERE plant_id = '45678a82-612d-4d29-bd17-8f7fe4b0840c';
SELECT AVG(water_duration) AS avg_water_duration FROM plant_watering_schedule;
SELECT * FROM plant_watering_schedule WHERE water_duration > '1 hour';
SELECT plant_id, schedule_time FROM plant_watering_schedule WHERE moisture_threshold < 0.5 ORDER BY schedule_time DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, plant_id, water_duration FROM plant_watering_schedule WHERE moisture_threshold BETWEEN 0.3 AND 0.6 ORDER BY water_duration ASC;
SELECT schedule_id, schedule_time, moisture_threshold FROM plant_watering_schedule WHERE plant_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM plant_watering_schedule WHERE schedule_time >= '2022-10-01' AND schedule_time < '2022-11-01';
SELECT * FROM Plant;
SELECT plant_name, soil_moisture_level FROM Plant;
SELECT plant_name, soil_moisture_level FROM Plant WHERE soil_moisture_level > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM WateringSchedule ORDER BY watering_time ASC;
SELECT plant_id, COUNT(schedule_id) AS num_schedules FROM WateringSchedule GROUP BY plant_id;
SELECT * FROM Plant ORDER BY plant_name DESC;
SELECT plant_id, plant_name FROM Plant WHERE soil_moisture_level > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM WateringSchedule WHERE watering_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT Plant.plant_name, WateringSchedule.watering_time FROM Plant JOIN WateringSchedule ON Plant.plant_id = WateringSchedule.plant_id;
SELECT MAX(soil_moisture_level) AS max_moisture, MIN(soil_moisture_level) AS min_moisture FROM Plant;
SELECT * FROM PlantSchedule ORDER BY watering_time DESC;
SELECT plant_id, plant_name, plant_type FROM Plant WHERE soil_type='clay';
SELECT plant_id, watering_time FROM PlantSchedule WHERE soil_moisture_threshold > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01';
SELECT AVG(moisture_level) AS average_moisture FROM SensorData GROUP BY plant_id;
SELECT plant_id, plant_name, plant_type FROM Plant;
SELECT * FROM PlantSchedule WHERE soil_moisture_threshold > 0.5;
SELECT plant_id, last_watered FROM Plant ORDER BY last_watered DESC;
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE moisture_level < 0.3 ORDER BY timestamp LIMIT 10;

SELECT ps.*, p.plant_name, sd.moisture_level FROM PlantSchedule ps JOIN Plant p ON ps.plant_id = p.plant_id JOIN SensorData sd ON ps.plant_id = sd.plant_id WHERE ps.watering_time >= '2022-01-01' AND sd.moisture_level < 0.4;
SELECT * FROM soil_moisture_sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_id, location, moisture_level FROM soil_moisture_sensor_data WHERE moisture_level > 50;
SELECT plant_name, plant_type FROM plants WHERE optimal_moisture_level < 0.6;
SELECT * FROM plant_schedule ORDER BY watering_day DESC, watering_time ASC;
SELECT plant_name, COUNT(schedule_id) AS num_waterings FROM plants JOIN plant_schedule ON plants.plant_id = plant_schedule.plant_id GROUP BY plant_name;
SELECT * FROM soil_moisture_sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT plant_name, optimal_moisture_level FROM plants WHERE plant_type = 'Flower';
SELECT plant_name, optimal_moisture_level FROM plants WHERE optimal_moisture_level BETWEEN 4.0 AND 6.0;
SELECT location, moisture_level, timestamp FROM soil_moisture_sensor_data WHERE moisture_level > 5.0 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT schedule_id, watering_day, watering_time, duration_minutes FROM plant_schedule WHERE schedule_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM MoistureSensorData;
SELECT sensor_id, soil_moisture FROM MoistureSensorData ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC;
SELECT plant_name, plant_species FROM PlantList WHERE watering_schedule_interval > INTERVAL '1 day';
SELECT * FROM WateringSchedule WHERE watering_time >= TIME '08:00:00' AND watering_time <= TIME '12:00:00';
SELECT alert_type, alert_message FROM SensorAlerts WHERE sensor_id = 'e68c91d3-0de8-4bfa-b2c6-46a58c8bc50b';
SELECT * FROM MoistureSensorData WHERE soil_moisture > 50 ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC;
SELECT plant_name, plant_species, watering_schedule_interval FROM PlantList WHERE watering_schedule_interval < '1 day'
SELECT alert_type, alert_message FROM SensorAlerts WHERE alert_type = 'Critical' ORDER BY alert_id ASC
SELECT schedule_id, watering_time, watering_duration FROM WateringSchedule WHERE watering_duration > '1 hour' ORDER BY schedule_id;
SELECT log_id, watering_date, watering_time FROM WateringLog WHERE watering_date = '2022-10-15'
